Blog.post: hey2..me lyf has been pretty boring n rigid lately.i dun pass any stupid comments much 2 oth..i've been quite selfish.i dun care bout oth ppl's problemo.cuz it affects me so much.and so..i dcided nt 2 b involved in oth ppl's problemos.*cheers* been think really a lot.i dun c d nid of frens now.been thinkin wad flo said.mayb it's true.umph.''emptiness is void.Wholeness is a perfect circle.''nice huh.been quiet in sch..mixing wid diff ppl.nt really mixin la.mm..tusen juz now,tokd 2 tis grl i've nv talkd b4..haha..frm commonwealth.so weird.duno wasap wime.sumth wrong i spos.very weird n v scary....!!

ya noe! i bery d very d excited.weehehe..yesterday was so..haha..was soo sad in d morning..in sch..cried in d m'ning..upset bout a few things..thot bout lotsa upsetting stuff..yea..den..morning run..was a lil okay..P.E..better.lesson tym all okay..den afta sch..ma mind wanderd back 2 d stuff i was thinkin b4 sch n d day b4..den...upset..left ma fwens n went home b4 hmly..den met d rest at bk wm..went 2 hmly wid 'em.dint tok much.juz read d mly idioms list.n den..hmly..oso slightly okay.afta hmly,me n mira planned 2 go home.as usual la ar..heehs..at d bpghs covered walkway,saw ma ex.he's in dat sch.dint tok 2 him.dint tink he saw me.heh..dat's dat.den..took mrt..alight at bb mrt station.while cumin down d flight of stairs,saw alif(me ex) n his 2 fwens!! *mellts*hahaha...but we crossed d traffic light n head 4 d bus int.den at bus int..SAW LALA.wad a day of exes.n den..asked lala 2 follow me n mira 2 wm..haha..purposely.coz alif there.wehehe..den walkd in front of him..said hello..haha..lazy 2 write in detail ar.now tokin 2 ijan n danny.haha..hot3..:)

hey hey..juz done wid chem revision.nope..i wudnt say done.i'm neva gon b done wid chem rev until i'm done wid me Os.in a matter of mths tym.it's both a :) on a :( anyways..juz now..nuttin much happend in sch..nuttin interesting.tuesdays r neva interesting. mm..oni dat particular thursday..d 6th of may..2003. :) waddaheck.i'm dwellin on d paz.i m such a fake.in front of ppl..i put up a strong front.but at d end of d day..hmph..juz now..me sposta go burger king wid flo n bobo n khai.me waited for khai.in d end..gt tired of waitin for her n left her.afta so long,she was still tokin 2 ms ngiam.sangitah was wid her.actually wanted 2 accompany sang buy waffle.simce dey were so darn slow..i juz walked off..so irritated.den at bus stop..saw lala cumin towards me.looked awy.pretend as if i dint c him.he oso juz walkd.he went 2 d oth bus stop.den came 4 of ma clsmates.dey came n sat down wid me.tok cock...dey say i goin market la wad la..shitty siak.niway..khai.. i tink even if i wait,she wudnt cum along.hmph.i'm so dissapointed wid her n almos evry1 ard me.i duno y. been pretty down lately.only 1 person feel d same way. yest..me saw tis pic lala took wid dis grl..sec 4E.i neva had dat strong ill feelings for her.but since yest.i felt so betrayed..n i really hated d sight of d grl.feel lyk givin both lala n d grl a tite slap on d face n spit on 'em! ergh! i'm so fuckd up. i take pic wid me fwens..guy fwens..clsmates n dos close 2 me..but dis 1..I DUN TINK THEY'VE EVEN TALKED.den waddafuck siak.i took pic wid him oso nt dat close.i actually cried wen i saw d pic.hmph.i juz dun undastand...i noe we've broken up n all..but still..i DO HAF FEELINGS FOR HIM!! cant he see it!! he told me he has too..but y!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! sumtyms i really feel lyk letting go..totally let go...forget bout him totally.move on wid lyf..i'd think...''is there really nuttin more for d 2 of us?''but then again..part of me wansta stick 2 him. it's so damn hard.. *Dun forget me Clyde. forever yours , Bonnie

god..it's lyk forever for me 2 b able 2 log in here.shiityy..but neymind.gt loads 2 write but quite lazy.heehs. mmm..basically same ol stuff..dan..lala..all d ppl ard me..aishah.haha..weird ppl i wud say.nt tym i update ar.lazy 2 typ.

yesterday,2nd of august,i had a huge unspoken war wid lala,mira,aishah.i am so irkd.i duno y i even bother. jealousy gt over me.but now,i'm much better.tokd 2 lala.tokd 2 mirah.dint c aishah d whole day.haah.sheesh.wad up wime! so over protective.we're history man.shitty. he waited 4 me at d bus stop near me haus wid his cuz.i juz walkd past.he chased me.i walkd even faster.he cudnt cath up i tink..den he gav up.saw his pathetic face wen i was in d lift.felt guilty.he's oways successful wen it cums 2 makin me guilty ya noe.but hell..i made him more guilty. was so sarkastic d whole tym i tokd 2 him.tired.satisfied.evrything.fighter.fighter,fighter.!! woohoo..haha ya noe..juz now.dan askd me..since i gt me hp back..i've been smsin him evryday.i dint notice dat till he pointed it out.gawd.y siak.mayb coz i'm lonely? mayb coz i'm angry?mayb coz i'm bored? mayb coz i.....?? wad??hah.den i told him..mayb coz i'm bored.den he said..oh u bored den u cum 2 me.heh..den i said ''at least,of all ppl,i choose U!haha..chosen,unlycky 1.Poor u.neymind la.heh wid effect frm tml,i find oth victim la k.U shalt b spared'' hees.. C d diff btw me msgs 2 him n me msgs 2 lala? ITZ A WERLD OF A DIFF!!he juz replied.he said..wad seh..''take me for granted.dun fwen u'' haha..i replied''wad seh.i said,i shall spare u wad..FLOWEr!dun fwen dun fwen la.Poda'' hah.. i dun tink we'll eva meet.ever.it's lyk..we haf tokd bout it,came up wid d subject coupla tyms.but we nv did meet.juz nt meant 2 b.haha..ryt. he replied''haha..kena flower seh...haha...no dun spare me..i'm ya slave..'' wehehehe.. aww..ahaha..but....this still drilled in me head. ''Baby look me in the eyes and tell me yeah

how come we dun even tok no more? u dun even call no more? we've cum 2 a point where we no longer gaf niting 2 say.he said ''yep''.den smiled.hmph.seriously.mayb he's juz plain bz.i've been callin him a lot lately.duno y.mayb kinda irrtatin.sent me pics.mayb he's lyk dat coz he's seen d silly me.sheesh.wadeva la har..haha..i cant b soo affected by this stuff..ppl gt their own lyf.n i've gt mine.soooo..... :) dint go religious class today.kinda finishd me hwk n studied a bit.later continue again.hees.i'm so bored.isyan ask if i wanna tag her go c firewerks.mm..duno wen..but i wanna go!!!
